title: Physiological stress responses in horses participating in novice endurance rides
content:
Publication date: 15 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 11

Author(s): Onjira Huangsaksri, Kanokpan Sanigavatee, Chanoknun Poochipakorn, Thita Wonghanchao, Mona Yalong, Khunanont Thongcham, Chanikarn Srirattanamongkol, Siwakorn Pornkittiwattanakul, Thanawan Sittiananwong, Burasarin Ithisariyanont, Chatrapee Pakpokai, Supanut Ninyeeruae, Metha Chanda
